properties.address: Mondays at 7pm at Abbot Street Lounge, 16 Barbers Croft, Arbroath DD11 1HB.
properties.description: A men's suicide prevention charity, providing a place to come and be, talk or listen. It's not complicated to join us, there's no waiting lists, you don't need a referral, just turn up and have a cup of tea with us and remember, it is okay to talk.
properties.title: Andy's Man Club

properties.address: Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays 10am to 3pm at Montrose Connections, 98 Murray Street, Montrose, DD10 8JG.
properties.description: Meeting Centres are a community based inclusive intervention to support people with mild to moderate dementia and their family carers.
properties.title: Dementia support hub
